thread.title: Ever a Surprise: “Beauty and the Beast” Running Shoes
thread.title_full: Ever a Surprise: “Beauty and the Beast” Running Shoes

author: bdalek1
title: Ever a Surprise: “Beauty and the Beast” Running Shoes
text:
1/5 Photograph courtesy of New Balance 
Vazee Rush 
While you might not run in these, they make for an appealing “princess slipper.” The slip-on has a bouquet of wildflowers across the strap, which keeps your foot secure—and adds a splash of color. $100, newbalance.com 2/5 Photograph courtesy of New Balance 
Vazee Transform 
This cross-trainer draws its look from Belle’s ball gown, with metallic gold popping off of the mesh upper. $80, newbalance.com 3/5 Photograph courtesy of New Balance 
Fresh Foam Zante v3 
We recently awarded the Zante v3 our Editor’s Choice in the 2017 Spring Shoe Guide. This version “is inspired by the magic rose kept in the West Wing of the Beast’s castle,” according to New Balance. The logo also features wildflowers, reminiscent of Belle’s ball gown. $120, newbalance.com . 
4/5 Photograph courtesy of New Balance 
790v6 
This children’s shoe comes in two colors. The first consists of a majestic blue and gold to match Belle’s light blue dress. $60, newbalance.com 5/5 Photograph courtesy of New Balance 
790v6 
The second version of this shoe for the kids comes in purple and has pops of gold roses on the upper. $60, newbalance.com
